channel.title: 317 PK - STARTED 12-27-2013 [Allstar]
channel.description:
I am using an Allstar 317 base (please don't tell me nobody uses or likes these anymore, I know people do like them.)
I have cleaned the client.java up SO much today. I have fixed a few glitches so far, and I still have a BUNCH more glitches to fix.
Glitches fixed so far: -blood rune glitch -trade dupe -telegrab dupe -shops > train > modzone glitch -height glitch -starter dupe (both) -level 126 can no longer attack level 3 -max cash is 2147M not 999M
This server will be based in Edgeville, where people can come pk. The starter is is pure lamp and a master lamp. You can choose to be a pure or a master, and sell the other lamp to the shop, and use that money to buy gear to pk with.
You will earn PK points, and killstreak awards, every kill. Do you have what it takes to become number 1 on the scoreboards??
** I am sorry for so little information, I just wanted to get this posted so I can update it later!*

item.title: 317 PK - STARTED 12-27-2013 [Allstar]
item.dc:creator: @FizzerX637 FizzerX637
item.description:
@FizzerX637 wrote:

[quote=“artem543, post:19, topic:537677”][quote author=Ambokile link=topic=656501.msg4395853#msg4395853 date=1389092461]
You shouldn’t list the specific dupes that you have fixed, because then people will know which ones you haven’t.
[/quote]
So true! As they can login. Try the one you fixed as say “nah, let’s go play another server”. As you specified, they can login and do the one you haven’t fixed. Good point.[/quote]

Very good point both of you, thank you for the feedback.

And yes, I could use some help. At the moment I am trying to figure out how to start compiling/running on Mac. After I can figure it out, then I will definitely like your help.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Chronikk_HD Chronikk_HD
item.description:
@Chronikk_HD wrote:

Allstar base is awesome imo. I ran Leroypkscape for about a year off allstar (don’t hate on the name I was 13 when I made it) and It was fun. Maybe cause it was my starter base and it’s how I learned to code, which is why I love it so much, but whenever this server comes online I will defenelty give it a go.

@FizzerX637 wrote:

Togasa:

Cody… IDK if you remember meh skillz in programming allstars (haha) but I may wannab e apart of this if you want

I don’t remember that name… I have lost contact with everyone I coded RSPS with, sadly. Hoping to get my crew back!! lol. If you ever coded with ReaperX from ReaperXScape (I think he went back to real rs) then we probably did something together. But yeah I am wanting to get some help on this project, I will have to install Skype soon. I have been very busy with my job, plus my MineCraft crew videos. But I will set up Skype and I will give you my name, and we can code!

Thanks
